column4: I need some help please, i try to mount an .iso but i cant succeed. here is responce http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/m63a3c8dc
sorry but i didn't understand the question quite well, i am still learning ubuntu :(
just after trying the mount that fails run « dmesg | tail » and paste the output of that too
are you sure it is a iso filesystem ? can the file be corrupted ?
well i was using it in windows quiet well :(
i did it says: "mount: you must specify the filesystem type"
i got same responce like with iso9660 :(
¡¿?! ? how you created that iso. what program you used in windows to "mount" it ?
i could burn it with nero 7 and deamon was mounting it
i suspect that it is not an iso image but maybe *.nrg or *.bin or something like that... look into converting it with bchunk or similar software
